articles.description: NEWPORT County AFC are searching for a new manager to steer them away from trouble in League Two after the exit of James Rowberry on Monday evening.
articles.content:
KEVIN Ellison was swift to react on social media to the exit of his former Newport County AFC boss James Rowberry on Monday evening, suggesting that hed be firing off his CV.
The Exiles are on the h… [+3325 chars]
